location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 298 of 1853 from Henry Edward Goldsmid, Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the receipt of the Resident's communication (No. 617) dated 27 July 1853, and informing him that the Governor of Bombay approves of his proceedings.
